alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 4:04PM EDT until May 21 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR PUTNAM...SOUTHEASTERN VAN WERT AND ALLEN COUNTIES... At 403 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elida, or 8 miles east of Delphos, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lima, Delphos, Ottawa, Bluffton, Fort Shawnee, Spencerville, Columbus Grove, Elida, Kalida, Pandora, Glandorf, Spencerville In Allen County, Cairo, Fort Jennings, Beaverdam, Gilboa, Miller City, Rushmore, Gomer and Rimer. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 126 and 141. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
